MACRO
Recived is a large polypoid lesion measureing 47 x 42 x 22mm high with point of attachment 22 x 17mm
Treated c ABs and definitely improved. On emollients => supply AB ung.

extension.valueString: H: Left neck / Shoulder pain with parathaesiae left arm - acute onset induced by reaching movement - few similar niggles over previous days - neck or shoulder movement still causes pain - seen by paramedics this morning within few hours onset. Has eased significantly since - was given oramorph - ECG nil acute - BP also found to be elevated. E: Obese ++, not shocked / distressed, pulse 75bpm, O/E - soft tissue swelling (XM1XQ)in left suprascapular area with restricted neck rotation -> left. Oxygen saturation at periphery (X770D) D: Cervical root syndrome (N13y3)Brachial neuralgia P: -> CXR & C/spine -> simple analgesia & monitor BP

content.comments: H: Left neck / Shoulder pain with parathaesiae left arm - acute onset induced by reaching movement - few similar niggles over previous days - neck or shoulder movement still causes pain - seen by paramedics this morning within few hours onset.
